Reviews.Title: Phone
Reviews.Author: Daniel
Reviews.Content: This was a good phone when it was new but I bought a used one the back wound not stay on and it was beat up good also I sent it back.

Reviews.Title: Good starter phone for the Tweens
Reviews.Author: Sam
Reviews.Content: This was one of My first touchscreen phones years ago took great pictures and videos.... do need an sd card was able to internet browse back when it was all brand new very durable dropped a few times never cracked the screen just a few scratches..... recommend for talk and txt it is a great starter phone..... samsung is tops.....

Reviews.Title: phone
Reviews.Author: Pen Name
Reviews.Content: My son enjoys his phone and it seems to be working good. I will return to buy another phone as soon as he breaks this one.

Reviews.Title: samsung solstice
Reviews.Author: stellamay09
Reviews.Content: I love the screen, pretty picture, great for watching videos.  but it has a very short memory.  Must get a memory card.  Cant download games without one.

Reviews.Title: samsung
Reviews.Author: christine
Reviews.Content: the phone was purchased for my job to download photos from ..it did not work properly and I had to return it.
